channel.description: Recent content in sharpcouch on Mark Needham

item.title: SharpCouch: Use anonymous type to create JSON objects
item.description: Iâ€™ve been playing around with CouchDB a bit today and in particular making use of SharpCouch, a library which acts as a wrapper around CouchDB calls. It is included in the CouchBrowse library which is recommended as a good starting point for interacting with CouchDB from C# code. I decided to work out how the API worked with by writing an integration test to save a document to the database.
